00078     public Randomness(Test test, Inputs inputData) 
00079     {
00080         aTest = test;
00081         inputs = inputData;
00082         beta = aTest.getBetaMin();
00083         int n = inputData.getNodeList().length;
00084         nEdges = (n - 1) * (n - 2) / 2; // The depot is not considered
00085         rng = initializeRNG();
00086         
00087         rngJava = initializeRngJava();
00088     }
00089 
00099     public int[] calcPositionsArray(String distribution) 
00100     {
00101         int[] posArray = new int[nEdges];
00102        
00103         // Select a new beta value (only for Geometric distribution)
00104         beta = rng.nextDouble() * (aTest.getBetaMax() - aTest.getBetaMin())
00105                 + aTest.getBetaMin();
00106 
00107         // array of "pointers" to jobs in effList
00108         LinkedList<Integer> auxArray = new LinkedList<Integer>();
00109         
00110         for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00111         {
00112             auxArray.add(i);
00113         }
00114         
00115         int pos = 0;
00116         // Assign new random positions
00117         for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00118         {
00119             pos = getRandomPosition(nEdges - i, distribution);
00120             posArray[i] = auxArray.get(pos);
00121             auxArray.remove(pos);
00122         }
00123 
00124         return posArray;
00125     }
00126 
00138     public int[] calcPositionsArray(String distribution, int noJob) 
00139     {
00140         int[] posArray = new int[noJob];
00141         
00142         // Select a new beta value (only for Geometric distribution)
00143         beta = rng.nextDouble() * (aTest.getBetaMax() - aTest.getBetaMin())
00144                 + aTest.getBetaMin();
00145 
00146         // array of "pointers" to jobs in effList
00147         LinkedList<Integer> auxArray = new LinkedList<Integer>();
00148         
00149         for (int i = 0; i < noJob; i++) 
00150         {
00151             auxArray.add(i);
00152         }
00153         
00154         int pos = 0;
00155         // Assign new random positions
00156         for (int i = 0; i < noJob; i++) 
00157         {
00158             pos = getRandomPosition(noJob - i, distribution);
00159             posArray[i] = auxArray.get(pos);
00160             auxArray.remove(pos);
00161         }
00162 
00163         return posArray;
00164     }
00165 
00177     public int[] calcPositionsArray() 
00178     {
00179         String distribution = aTest.getDistribution();
00180         int[] posArray = new int[nEdges];
00181         int[] auxArray = new int[nEdges]; // array of "pointers" to edges in effList
00182 
00183         // Select a new beta value (only for Geometric distribution)
00184         beta = rng.nextDouble() * (aTest.getBetaMax() - aTest.getBetaMin())
00185                 + aTest.getBetaMin();
00186 
00187         // Reset auxArray
00188         for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00189         {
00190             auxArray[i] = i;
00191         }
00192         
00193         // Assign new random positions
00194         for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00195         {
00196             int pos = getRandomPosition(nEdges - i, distribution);
00197             posArray[i] = auxArray[pos];
00198             for (int j = pos; j < nEdges - i - 1; j++) 
00199             {
00200                 auxArray[j] = auxArray[j + 1];
00201             }
00202         }
00203         return posArray;
00204     }
00205     
00213    public int[] calcPositionsArrayFast() 
00214    {
00215        String distribution = aTest.getDistribution();
00216        int[] posArray = new int[nEdges];
00217       
00218 
00219        // Select a new beta value (only for Geometric distribution)
00220        beta = rng.nextDouble() * (aTest.getBetaMax() - aTest.getBetaMin())
00221                + aTest.getBetaMin();
00222 
00223        // Reset auxArray
00224        LinkedList<Integer> auxArray = new LinkedList<Integer>();
00225        
00226        for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00227        {
00228            auxArray.add(i);
00229        }
00230        
00231        int pos = 0;
00232        // Assign new random positions
00233        for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00234        {
00235            pos = getRandomPosition(nEdges - i, distribution);
00236            posArray[i] = auxArray.get(pos);
00237            auxArray.remove(pos);
00238        }
00239        
00240        return posArray;
00241    }

00252    public int[] calcPositionsArrayFastJava() 
00253    {
00254       String distribution = aTest.getDistribution();
00255       int[] posArray = new int[nEdges];
00256      
00257 
00258       // Select a new beta value (only for Geometric distribution)
00259       beta = rngJava.nextDouble() * (aTest.getBetaMax() - aTest.getBetaMin())
00260               + aTest.getBetaMin();
00261 
00262       // Reset auxArray
00263       LinkedList<Integer> auxArray = new LinkedList<Integer>();
00264       
00265       for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00266       {
00267           auxArray.add(i);
00268       }
00269       
00270       int pos = 0;
00271       // Assign new random positions
00272       for (int i = 0; i < nEdges; i++) 
00273       {
00274           pos = getRandomPositionJava(nEdges - i, distribution);
00275           posArray[i] = auxArray.get(pos);
00276           auxArray.remove(pos);
00277       }
00278       
00279       return posArray;
00280    }
00281 
00293     public int nextInt(int a, int b) 
00294     {
00295         return rng.nextInt(a, b);
00296     }
00297 
00309     private int getRandomPosition(int n, String dist) // random between 0 and n-1
00310     {
00311         int pos = 0;
00312         char distribution = dist.charAt(0);
00313         if (distribution == 't' || distribution == 'T') // Triangular
00314         {
00315             pos = (int) (n * (1 - Math.sqrt(rng.nextDouble())));
00316         } 
00317         else if (distribution == 'g' || distribution == 'G') // Geometric
00318         {
00319             pos = (int) (Math.log(rng.nextDouble()) / Math.log(1 - beta));
00320             pos = pos % n;
00321         } 
00322         else // Uniform
00323         {
00324             pos = rng.nextInt(0, n - 1);
00325             //pos = (int) (n * rng.nextDouble());
00326         }
00327         return pos;
00328     }
00329     
00343     private int getRandomPositionJava(int n, String dist) // random between 0 and n-1
00344     {
00345         int pos = 0;
00346         char distribution = dist.charAt(0);
00347         if (distribution == 't' || distribution == 'T') // Triangular
00348         {
00349             pos = (int) (n * (1 - Math.sqrt(rngJava.nextDouble())));
00350         } 
00351         else if (distribution == 'g' || distribution == 'G') // Geometric
00352         {
00353             pos = (int) (Math.log(rngJava.nextDouble()) / Math.log(1 - beta));
00354             pos = pos % n;
00355         } 
00356         else // Uniform
00357         {
00358             pos = rngJava.nextInt(n - 1);
00359             //pos = (int) (n * rng.nextDouble());
00360         }
00361         return pos;
00362     }
00363 
00369     private RandomStream initializeRNG() 
00370     {
00371         int seed = Math.max(aTest.getSeed(), 128);
00372         int seedArray[] = {seed, seed, seed, seed};
00373         LFSR113.setPackageSeed(seedArray);
00374         RandomStream stream = new LFSR113();
00375         return stream;
00376     }
00377     
00383     private Random initializeRngJava()
00384     {
00385         int seed = Math.max(aTest.getSeed(), 128);
00386         return new Random(seed); 
00387     }
00388 }
